rawContent:
Mohammed Rabani. Iman Boy Raper

Yes we’ve got loads of paedo priests of our own and if we could deport them I’d happily get them on there way somewhere but that doesn’t mean that we shouldn’t deport other paedo priests, a paedo is a paedo and we don’t want any of the fuckers here

Deport 

Help me, Help @SuellaBraverman make the right decision, she’s not gonna want an asshole like me, telling her constituents what’s going on, trying to convince them to vote for anyone but her, is she?

If you want to see a change please give us a follow, give us a retweet , you’re not following a person or a political party, the only aim Atm is to get foreign criminals deported  

Getting the petition signed by as many people as possible.  (Once the government finish checking it)is our priority 

I doubt the petition is going to make them do anything but when it’s signed by enough people we will have a mandate. 
Support gives us the green light for direct action  

Wording of Petition below

Imprisoned Foreign criminals deported and never to be released back into 🇬🇧

Foreign Nationals including Asylum Seekers and Uk Passport holders with dual citizenship or previous Asylum Claims, who are sentenced to imprisonment of 12mths or over to be mandatorily deported unless otherwise ordered by the sentencing judge, if not done by EDR then held in secure accommodation

The sentencing judge will be in possession of pre sentence reports etc and is the best placed person to make a decision on deportation, the deportation decision is not appealable, this doesn’t preclude any other appeal based around the conviction and sentence. In the instance of UKBA 2007 sec 33(2) if the deportee wishes to appeal on these grounds, the appellant must be held in secure accommodation until the decision is made, no appeal can be launched until the EDR has been reached.
